Address.value: 201 HASKINS WAY,SUITE 301, SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO, California, 94080, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Lyell Immunopharma Inc is a T cell reprogramming company dedicated towards the mastery of T cells to eradicate solid tumors. Its pipeline includes CARs (Chimeric antigen receptors), TILs (Tumor-infiltrating lymphocytes), and TCRs (T cell receptors).
